trans-unit.source: Binds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (or another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> implementation).
trans-unit.target: Associa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (o a un'altra implementazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" />).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> associa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> è l'implementazione di primaria il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interfaccia per il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] sistema dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> is executed the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: In generale, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> viene eseguito il comando viene richiamato, anche se il comportamento del comando è influenzato ulteriormente da fattori specifici di comando, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui comandi, vedere il [panoramica dei comandi](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain exactly one <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Fatta eccezione per i tasti funzione e il tastierino numerico, un valido <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> deve contenere esattamente un <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> e uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: Function keys and numeric keypad keys do not require a modifier key in order to be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Tasti funzione e tastierino numerico non richiede un tasto di modifica per essere valido <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> with an invalid associated gesture, either through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare un oggetto non valido <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> con un tag movimento associato, tramite [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] o codice.

trans-unit.source: For instance, there is no validation that prevents creating and binding a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> that contains only a nonfunction key, or only modifiers but no key.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, non vengono convalidati che impedisce la creazione e l'associazione una <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> che contiene solo un tasto di funzione, o solo modificatori ma alcuna chiave.

trans-unit.source: Such a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> will never attempt to invoke its associated command.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> mai tenterà di richiamare il comando associato.

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si definisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] esistono due modi per specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: Il primo modo per stabilire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento, che consente una sintassi per specificare le chiavi e i modificatori come singola stringa, ad esempio "CTRL + P".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attribute and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> attributes of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo modo consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attributo e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> gli attributi del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> sono equivalenti e modificare lo stesso oggetto sottostante, ma ci sarà un conflitto se entrambi vengono utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> gli attributi sono impostati, verrà utilizzato l'attributo è definito ultimo per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: È possibile avere situazioni in cui ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set ultimo sovrascriverà solo il componente chiave del movimento precedente, ma lasciare invariato modificatori del movimento.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione in forma più semplice per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> possono essere definite in un oggetto specifico o a livello di classe registrando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> sulla <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> classe.

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: Il modo più comune per definire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> si trova all'interno del modello di controllo, impostando il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> proprietà [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] dichiarando uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elementi.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> of the root window.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> e lo aggiunge al <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> della finestra principale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The command to associate with <c>gesture</c>.
trans-unit.target: Comando da associare al parametro <c>gesture</c>.

trans-unit.source: The key combination to associate with <c>command</c>.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione di tasti da associare a <c>comando</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> utilizzando gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="command" /> or <paramref name="gesture" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="command" /> o <paramref name="gesture" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Comando da richiamare.

trans-unit.source: The key to be associated with <c>command</c>.
trans-unit.target: Il tasto da associare all'oggetto <c>comando</c>.

trans-unit.source: The modifiers to be associated with <c>command</c>.
trans-unit.target: Modificatori da associare a <c>comando</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> which will be converted into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" /> mediante gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> specificati e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> che verrà convertito in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il movimento associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The key sequence.
trans-unit.target: Sequenza di tasti.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Fatta eccezione per i tasti funzione e il tastierino numerico, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> deve contenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> e uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> using a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> (the markup and code examples specify different keys but are otherwise equivalent).
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come associare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> (negli esempi di codice e markup specificare chiavi diverse ma in caso contrario sono equivalenti).

trans-unit.source: the value <paramref name="gesture" /> is being set to is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.
trans-unit.target: il valore <paramref name="gesture" /> che viene impostato non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The key part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.
trans-unit.target: Parte di tasti dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.None" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.Key.None" />.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Fatta eccezione per i tasti funzione e il tastierino numerico, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> deve contenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> e uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si definisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] esistono due modi per specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: Il primo modo per stabilire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento, che consente una sintassi per specificare le chiavi e i modificatori come singola stringa, ad esempio "CTRL + P".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attribute and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> attributes of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo modo consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attributo e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> gli attributi del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> sono equivalenti e modificare lo stesso oggetto sottostante, ma ci sarà un conflitto se entrambi vengono utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> gli attributi sono impostati, verrà utilizzato l'attributo è definito ultimo per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: È possibile avere situazioni in cui ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set ultimo sovrascriverà solo il componente chiave del movimento precedente, ma lasciare invariato modificatori del movimento.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione in forma più semplice per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The modifier keys of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.
trans-unit.target: I tasti di modifica dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.None" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.None" />.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Fatta eccezione per i tasti funzione e il tastierino numerico, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> deve contenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> e uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si definisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] esistono due modi per specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: Il primo modo per stabilire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento, che consente una sintassi per specificare le chiavi e i modificatori come singola stringa, ad esempio "CTRL + P".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attribute and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> attributes of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo modo consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attributo e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> gli attributi del <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> sono equivalenti e modificare lo stesso oggetto sottostante, ma ci sarà un conflitto se entrambi vengono utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> gli attributi sono impostati, verrà utilizzato l'attributo è definito ultimo per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: È possibile avere situazioni in cui ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set ultimo sovrascriverà solo il componente chiave del movimento precedente, ma lasciare invariato modificatori del movimento.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione in forma più semplice per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso della sintassi XAML per gli attributi

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valori XAML

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreModifierKeys*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreModifierKeys*

trans-unit.source: One or more modifier keys, defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: Uno o più tasti di modifica, definiti per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumerazione, delimitati con un carattere "+".

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers" />.
